title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Test that users across all roles can log in successfully with correct username/email and password using the unified authentication system.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify user is redirected to the appropriate role-based dashboard
Verify session is initialized and role information is correctly set

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify login fails when users enter incorrect username/email or password and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login is rejected
Verify appropriate error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: Role-based dashboard access control
description: Ensure that users can only access dashboards corresponding to their roles and are prevented from accessing unauthorized dashboards.

steps.description: Login as a user with a specific role (e.g., Manager)
Attempt to navigate manually or by URL to other role-specific dashboards such as Super Admin or SEO team dashboard
Verify access is denied and redirection or error message occurs
Logout and login as another role (e.g., SEO employee)
Attempt to access Manager or Administrator dashboards
Verify access restrictions are enforced consistently

title: Employee onboarding form validation and submission
description: Verify employee onboarding process enforces field validations, disallows duplicates, and accepts valid data submissions.

steps.description: Navigate to Employee Onboarding form as Admin
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit
Verify validation errors are shown for required fields
Input duplicate employee email or ID and attempt submit
Verify duplicate entry errors are shown preventing submission
Fill form with valid new employee data including required proofs and submit
Verify employee is successfully onboarded and visible in employee list

title: Client onboarding with proof upload and validation
description: Confirm client onboarding form validates all required fields and enforces mandatory proof document uploads before submission.

steps.description: Navigate to Client Onboarding form as Admin
Attempt to submit the form without uploading required proof documents
Verify submission is blocked with appropriate validation messages
Fill all required fields and upload valid proof documents
Submit the form
Verify client is added successfully and reflected in Client Dashboard

title: Employee monthly tactical form validation including client duplicates
description: Ensure monthly tactical submission form validates required KPIs, proof URLs, and disallows duplicate client selections in dropdown.

steps.description: Login as employee and navigate to monthly tactical form
Attempt to submit form with missing KPIs and no proof URLs
Verify validation errors prevent submission
Select the same client multiple times in dropdowns
Verify form prevents duplicate client selection
Fill all mandatory data with valid proof URLs and unique clients
Submit form
Verify submission succeeds and data is stored

title: Automatic appraisal delay triggered by insufficient learning hours
description: Verify that employees logging less than 6 learning hours in their monthly report trigger appraisal delay and scoring penalties.

steps.description: Login as employee and navigate to monthly form
Enter learning hours less than 6
Complete other mandatory fields and submit
Verify system flags appraisal delay and applies scoring penalties
Submit another form with learning hours equal or greater than 6
Verify appraisal processing continues without penalties

title: Client project tracking and payment proof enforcement
description: Verify client projects display correct statuses and payment tracking requires mandatory proof URLs before status updates.

steps.description: Navigate to a client's project dashboard as Manager
Attempt to mark project payment as complete without uploading proof URL
Verify action is disallowed with appropriate error message
Upload valid payment proof and update payment status to complete
Verify payment status update is successful and reflected in dashboard

title: Sales pipeline lead stage tracking and conversion analytics accuracy
description: Confirm sales team can drag-and-drop leads between stages in Kanban UI and conversion metrics reflect accurate lead counts and rates.

steps.description: Login as sales team member and open sales pipeline dashboard
Drag a lead from one stage to another on Kanban board
Verify lead stage updates and persists correctly
Add multiple leads from various sources and progress them through stages
Verify lead counts and conversion metrics update accurately on analytics views

title: Accounts dashboard retainer vs one-time payment workflow and bulk update support
description: Validate accounts dashboard distinguishes retainer and one-time payments, shows status visibility, and supports bulk payment status updating.

steps.description: Login as accountant and open accounts dashboard
Verify payments are categorized correctly as retainer or one-time with clear status indicators
Select multiple payments and perform bulk payment status update
Verify bulk updates apply successfully and correct statuses are displayed

title: PDF and CSV reporting generation performance and data accuracy
description: Ensure that generated tactical, quarterly, and performance reports export to PDF and CSV formats within 10 seconds and contain complete accurate data.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin and navigate to report generation module
Generate monthly tactical report PDF for a team
Verify report is generated and downloaded within 10 seconds
Verify report content includes all expected KPIs, client feedback, and appraisal data accurately
Generate quarterly strategic report CSV for an individual employee
Verify CSV file is generated quickly and contains comprehensive, correct data

title: Notification delivery and alert accuracy
description: Confirm notification system reliably delivers alerts to appropriate users about submissions deadlines, payment dues, and compliance risks.

steps.description: Trigger a submission deadline alert by simulating an overdue monthly form
Verify employee receives notification about submission deadline
Update a payment status that is past due to trigger alert
Verify accountant and relevant managers receive payment due notification
Simulate appraisal risks due to missing feedback or proof documents
Verify notifications are delivered to Super Admin and involved employees

title: Audit log immutable recording of data accesses and changes
description: Verify that audit logs capture all user accesses, data modifications, and system events immutably as per specification.

steps.description: Perform data create, update, and delete operations across various modules (employee, client, payments)
Verify corresponding immutable entries captured in the audit logs with correct timestamps, user IDs, and change details
Attempt to modify or delete audit log entries
Verify audit logs are protected and cannot be altered or removed
